name: Super Massive Blackhole
description:
A 3rd-person space shooter which has the player traversing the galaxy to reclaim planets from invaders.

Buy awesome weapon upgrades, dodge waves of lasers, save allies, and bomb craters on your way to obliterate the enemy home base.

Navigation:

  • [Q] and [E] to strafe left and right
  • [W] and [S] to move forward and back
  • [A] and [D] to rotate

Weapons:

  • [J] Basic Laser
  • [U] Ground Targeted Death Ray
  • [K] Ground Targeted Missile
  • [I] Drop Mine
  • [L] Shield
  • [O] EMP
